Articles.Content:
hello guys,

so I'm trying to get to Duna. Failed miserablx the first 1000 times or so and now I think I have my rocket for the job. Awesome.

but:

i would like to set the launch to the perfect phase angle without warping my ass off. Is there a possibility to set the date or something without Warping?

would be awesome!

There is, but you have to go in and edit the persistent.sfs file in your saves folder. I've never done it, so back up the file first, but I believe you'll need to edit the 'UT' parameter. I think the value is in seconds, so you'll want to work out the total seconds represented by the date you want, and set it to that. Good luck...
